fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give someone a loving and heartfelt lobotomy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your targets lose a random ability but gain permanent Powerful defense.
- You are the boywife of another random player, you learn their name, if you lobotomize them, they don't lose an ability.
- If you spawn alongside The Boyfriends Webcomic (2925), you both start as each other's boywives for your respective effects.
